languages.text: "Ты не дал варпу сломить себя, и я верю, что свет Императора силен в твоей душе. Продолжай службу, ибо ты нужен Человечеству и в долге найдешь искупление".

traits.locale_text: "Ты не дал варпу сломить себя, и я верю, что свет Императора силен в твоей душе. Продолжай службу, ибо ты нужен Человечеству, и лишь в долге найдешь искупление".

languages.text: "You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."
languages.original_text: "Ты не дал варпу сломить себя, и я верю, что свет Императора силен в твоей душе. Продолжай службу, ибо ты нужен Человечеству и в долге найдешь искупление".

traits.locale_text: "You have not allowed the Warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."
"You have not allowed the Warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."
"You have not allowed the Warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."
"You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."
"You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."
"You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."

languages.text: «No se ha dejado domeñar por la disformidad, y creo que en su alma brilla con fuerza la luz del Emperador. Continúe con su servicio, pues la Humanidad le necesita, y en el cumplimiento del deber hallará su redención».
languages.original_text: "You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."

traits.locale_text: «No se ha dejado domeñar por la disformidad, y creo que en su alma brilla con fuerza la luz del Emperador. Continúe con su servicio, pues la Humanidad le necesita, y en el cumplimiento del deber hallará su redención».

languages.text: 「あなたは<歪み>に打ちのめされることなく、皇帝の光があなたの魂に強く宿っていると信じている。奉仕を続けなさい。人類があなたを必要としているのだから。そして義務の中で、あなたは救いを見つけるだろう」
languages.original_text: "You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは<歪み>に打ちのめされることなく、皇帝の光があなたの魂に強く宿っていると信じている。奉仕を続けなさい。人類があなたを必要としているのだから。そして義務の中で、あなたは救いを見つけるだろう」

languages.text: “你没有被亚空间摧垮，因此我相信，你的灵魂依然沐浴在帝皇的明光之中。继续侍奉帝国吧，因为人类需要你，你会在责任之中找到救赎。”
languages.original_text: "You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."

traits.locale_text: “你没有被亚空间摧垮，因此我相信，你的灵魂依然沐浴在帝皇的明光之中。继续侍奉帝国吧，因为人类需要你，你会在责任之中找到救赎。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch vom Warp nicht brechen lassen, und ich glaube, das Licht des Imperators ist stark in Eurer Seele. Dient weiter, denn die Menschheit braucht Euch, und in Eurer Pflicht werdet Ihr Erlösung finden."
languages.original_text: "You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euch vom Warp nicht brechen lassen, und ich glaube, das Licht des Imperators ist stark in Eurer Seele. Dient weiter, denn die Menschheit braucht Euch, und in Eurer Pflicht werdet Ihr Erlösung finden."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas laissé le Warp vous briser, et je reste {mf|persuadé|persuadée} que votre âme est toujours baignée dans la lumière de l'Empereur. L'Humanité a besoin de vous. C'est en accomplissant votre devoir et en continuant à la servir que vous trouverez la rédemption. »
languages.original_text: "You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas laissé le Warp vous briser, et je reste {mf|persuadé|persuadée} que votre âme est toujours baignée dans la lumière de l'Empereur. L'Humanité a besoin de vous. C'est en accomplissant votre devoir et en continuant à la servir que vous trouverez la rédemption. »

languages.text: "Öteboyutun seni ezip geçmesine göz yummadın. İmparator'un ışığının, ruhunda tüm gücüyle yayıldığına inanıyorum. Hizmetine devam et. Çünkü insanlığın sana ihtiyacı var. Kefaretini ödemenin yolu, vazifeden geçer."
languages.original_text: "You have not allowed the warp to break you, and I believe the Emperor's light is strong in your soul. Continue your service, for Humanity needs you, and in duty you will find redemption."
